https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w2gQDZnte8q4jscMpsiY755nv5T.jpg Mai (Rika Adachi) is a high school student. She attends a new school and there she meets her classmate Shino (Manami Enosawa). Shino was bullied by Mai's friends back in their middle school days. Table have now turned. Demon Covered in Scars
